CustomField.formula:
IF(ISBLANK(Workday_Company__c ), "US",

IF(CONTAINS("LE003 WMG Management Europe Limited:LE008 Wasserman Experience Limited:LE020 Ignite Music & Entertainment Limited:LE021 WMG Management Europe Elimination:LE038 Wasserman European Basketball, LLC:LE039 Key Sports Holdings Ltd:LE040 Key Sports Management Ltd", Workday_Company__c ), "UK",

IF(CONTAINS("LE006 Wasserman Sports & Entertainment, ULC", Workday_Company__c ), "Canada",
